responses.rationale: Factual report of a single case with descriptive details ('no symptoms', 'prolonged exposure') presented neutrally.
Quote contains explicit evaluative framing ('top of the list in terms of bad guy viruses') from a source.
Contains explicit statement of positive sentiment ('Iâ€™m encouraged') which is a reassuring cue.
Contains moderate verb ('strained') paired with scale/metric ('millions of dollars in losses') triggering Alarmist.
Contains moderate verb ('suffered') paired with scale/metric ('$1 billion in damages') triggering Alarmist.
Factual statement about risk level ('higher risk') presented neutrally without added framing.
Contains vivid verb ('surge') describing the impact (prices) triggering Alarmist.
Contains explicit low-risk statement ('risk...remains low') which is a reassuring cue.
Quote contains vivid description of impact/symptoms ('Screaming very loud, whole-body tremors') triggering Alarmist.
